name: The Antimatter Containment Operative
description:
Today you are the Antimatter Containment Operative (A.C.O)

A VR title for the Oculus Rift and HTC Vive (only briefly tested on Vive)

Your job is to use the VR interface to visualise and control the reactions in the core. Shapes represent matter and antimatter. Simply place appropriate shapes together to create clean energy reactions. Inappropriate or accidental collisions will destabilise the core. If the core becomes too unstable we will have to eject it into space.

Oh, and critical events occur frequently and must be dealt with quickly.

Get promoted through 5 levels.
